import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MatDialogRef } from '@angular/material/dialog'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-bill-dialog', templateUrl: './add-bill-dialog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-bill-dialog.component.scss'] }) export class AddBillDialogComponent { bill = { type: 'regular', name: '', amount: 0, dueDate: '', category: '', monthlyPayment: 0 }; get installmentInfo(): string { if (['regular', 'credit'].includes(this.bill.type) && this.bill.amount > 0 && this.bill.monthlyPayment > 0) { const totalMonths = Math.ceil(this.bill.amount / this.bill.monthlyPayment); return `0 of ${totalMonths} installments`; } return ''; } constructor(private dialogRef: MatDialogRef) {} close(): void { this.dialogRef.close(); } save(): void { this.dialogRef.close(this.bill); } }

Add New Bill
